Get a Rosetta Stone bundle that can teach you 24 languages for just $180
item.description: The Unlimited Lifetime Learning Bundle comes with Rosetta Stone and features lessons in 24 languages and 1,000+ skills courses through StackSkills Unlimited. Get both for life for just $179.97.

item.title: Replace your Microsoft 365 subscription with a lifetime license for $79.97
item.description: Microsoft Office Home and Business for Mac comes with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more, and it's only $79.97 for a lifetime license

item.title: Get a second phone number with this $30 app
item.description: Hushed is a privacy tool that adds a second number to your phone that works just like the first. You can get a 7,000-text lifetime plan with 1,250 call minutes for only $29.99.

item.title: Get AdGuard’s Family plan and protect up to 9 devices for just $19
item.description: Get a lifetime subscription to AdGuard Family Plan for just $18.97 and protect your family's online experience across up to 9 devices.

item.title: Wirelessly power your Apple devices for $27
item.description: Get the 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad for just $26.97 (reg. $69) through September 29.
